name: Annihilus, Ultimates
effect: When Annihilus enters play during the build phase, if Negative Zone is not in play, remove him from the game and return him to play at the start of the recovery phase this turn.

name: Black Bolt, Ultimates
effect: Free [>] Remove all face-down resources from the game. For each resource removed this way, its controller puts the top card of his deck face down into his resource row. Use only once per turn and only during the combat phase.

name: Captain America, Ultimates
effect: Remove an Ultimates card in your hand from the game [>] Target character gets +1 / +1 this turn.
"No, the world needs looking after."

name: Chitauri, Ultimates - Army
effect: Whenever Chitauri becomes stunned, reveal the top three cards from your deck. Remove any revealed cards named Chitauri from the game and put the rest on top of your deck in any order.

name: Clint Barton ~ Hawkeye, Ultimates
effect:
C
Remove Clint Barton from the game and exhaust a [SHIELD] or Ultimates character you control [>] Remove target stunned character from the game. Use only if Clint Barton is in your hand.
"Won't see them where you're going, Comrade."

name: Crossing Over, Ultimates
effect:
Ongoing: Ultimates character cards you control are not unique with cards with the same name but different version.
Characters you control with the same name can reinforce, be reinforced by, and team attack each other.
"You're not you - you're me."

name: Cyclops, Ultimates
effect: Whenever Cyclops stuns an opposing character, remove that character from the game unless its controller exhausts a character he controls.

name: Dr. Doom, Ultimates
effect: {Activate}, Remove from the game any number of cards from the top of your deck [>] Exhaust target character unless its controller removes more cards from the top of his deck.

name: From the Ashes, Ultimates
effect: Gain 1 endurance for each card in your deck.
"Hold me, Scott. Don't let go."

name: Gah Lak Tus!, Ultimates
effect:
Play only if you have played no plot twists this turn and you control an Ultimates character or a character named Galactus.
Ongoing:At the start of the recovery phase, each player removes a resource he controls from the game unless he removes a character he controls from the game.

name: Green Goblin, Ultimates
effect: Whenever Green Goblin attacks, remove from the game target character stunned by a [Sinister Syndicate] or Ultimates character this turn.
"PPAAARRRRKKKKEEERRRRR!"

name: Hank Pym ~ Giant Man, Ultimates
effect: At the start of the combat phase, remove the top card of your deck from the game. If it's an Ultimates card, put a +1/+1 counter on Hank Pym.
"You shouldn't have made me look small."

name: Hulk, Ultimates
effect: Whenever Hulk Enters combat, remove the top card of your deck from the game. Hulk gets +X/+X this turn, where X is the cost of that card. If X is 3 or less, repeat this process.
"Stupid naked man talk to much!"

name: Human Torch, Ultimates
effect: Remove Human Torch from the game [>] Stun target character with DEF 1.
"What good is having powers if you can't cut loose once in a while?"

name: Invisible Woman, Ultimates
effect: {Activate}, Remove the top five cards of your deck from the game [>] The controller of target character moves it to his other area.

name: Iron Man, Ultimates
effect: At the start of the combat phase, look at target opponent's hand. You may remove a non-character card in his hand from the game.
"Drinks at my place? Janet? Wanda?"

name: Jean Grey, Ultimates
effect: When Jean Grey enters play, target opponent loses 5 endurance unless he removes a character, equipment, or resource he controls from the game.
"Sometimes I hear voices. That doesn't make me crazy."

name: Juggernaut, Ultimates
effect: Remove a card in your hand from the game [>] Target Juggernaut can't be stunned while attacking or being attacked or be the target of opposing effects this turn.

name: Liberation Day, Ultimates
effect:
To play, remove an Ultimates character card in your hand from the game.
Search your deck for an Ultimates card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
"The Great Satan has been liberated."

name: Magneto, Ultimates
effect: When Magneto enters play, remove all equipment in play from the game. When Magneto next leaves play, each player returns to play all equipment he owns removed this way.

name: Mr. Fantastic, Ultimates
effect: {Activate}, Discard an Ultimates character card [>] Remove the top ten cards of your deck from the game, then search your deck for a card and put it in your hand.

name: Natasha Romanoff ~ Black Widow, Ultimates
effect:
C
{Activate} ---> Target character loses and can't gain team affiliations this turn. Use only during the combat phase.
"Thanks for the laughs, comrade."

name: Nick Fury, Ultimates
effect: Remove the top five cards of your deck from the game [>] Target Ultimates attacker can't be stunned this attack. Use only once per turn.
"Country still needs looking after, soldier."

name: Punisher, Ultimates
effect: {Activate}, Remove Punisher from the game [>] Stun target character with cost 5 or less.
"Wrong place, Wrong time, scum bag."

name: Quicksilver, Ultimates
effect: When Quicksilver becomes stunned, remove him from the game. If you do, return him to play at the start of your next recruit step.
"If you slow down the tapes, I think you'll see I saved your life on three separate occasions."

name: Scarlet Witch, Ultimates
effect: Remove Scarlet Witch from the game [>] Each player removes the top four cards of his deck from the game.

name: Shadowcat, Ultimates
effect:
C
Remove Shadowcat from the game [>] Remove from the game target character that didn't enter play this turn. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, return the character to play. Use only during your attack step.

name: Spider-Man, Ultimates
effect:
Characters named Spider-Man you control enter play with two web counters.
Remove X web counters from characters named Spider-Man you control [>] Exhaust any number of target characters with combined cost X or less. Use only once per turn.

name: Sub-Mariner, Ultimates
effect: When Sub-Mariner enters play, if you control another Atlantis or Ultimates character, each players removes his KO'd pile from the game and gains 1 endurance for each card removed this way.

name: Subterranea, Ultimates
effect:
Flip only if you control and Ultimates character.
{Activate} ---> Each player removes the top card of his deck from the game and each gains endurance equal to the lowest cost among cards removed this way.

name: The Triskelion, Ultimates
effect:
Flip only if you control an Ultimates character.
If a card would enter your KO'd pile, instead remove it from the game.
{Activate}, Remove your hand from the game [>] Return target card from your removed from game zone to your hand.

name: Thing, Ultimates
effect: Remove the top ten cards of your deck from the game [>] Target Ultimates character has invulnerability this attack.
"I don't think that's gonna do it. Anything else?"

name: Thor, Ultimates
effect: {Activate} ---> Target opponent chooses your deck or removed from game zone. He loses 1 endurance for each card in that zone.
"My father moves in mysterious ways."

name: Ultimate Human, Ultimates
effect: Ongoing: At the start of the combat phase, each player chooses a character he controls. When a character chosen this turn becomes stunned while in combat with another character chosen this turn, remove it from the game.

name: Wasp, Ultimates
effect:
C
{Activate}, Remove the top five cards of your deck from the game [>] Target player loses 3 endurance.
"I think this means we're officially super heroes."

name: Wolverine, Ultimates
effect: remove the top ten cards of your deck from the game [>] When Wolverine next becomes stunned this turn, recover him. Use only once per turn.
